What is even all this?

Hi!

This is just a little observable framework project to host some of my thoughts in an interactive and fun way. Also, my lingua franca is NOT javascript in its many forms. So this is also a way for me to expand and practice an additional langauge.

I have a bunch of thoughts on experimental design, data science, engineering, and other things. I'll do my best to document things in an appropriate and utilitarian manner. Not for you, but for me.
